Issue.summary: Node SDK provide reverse of Client.createUser functionality
Issue.description: { return client.getUserContext(id, true); }) .then((user) => { return { publicCertPEM: user.getIdentity()._certificate, privateKeyPEM: user.getSigningIdentity()._signer._key.toBytes() }; }); } {code} Would be good if the node SDK provided this functionality >
